front.title: Integration of Header Compression over IPsec Security Associations

abstract.t: Internet Protocol security mechanisms, such as IP Security (IPsec) [IPSEC], provide various security services for IP traffic. However, the benefits of IPsec come at the cost of increased overhead. This document defines a framework for integrating Header Compression (HC) over IPsec (HCoIPsec). By compressing the inner headers of IP packets, HCoIPsec proposes to reduce the amount of overhead associated with the transmission of traffic over IPsec security associations.
